sentences.en: After dwelling in Rio for ten years, she moved to Lisbon.
sentences.cn: 她在里约居住了10年之后迁居到里斯本去了.

sentences.en: Behind every apartment - houses, beside each dwelling, were small garages.
sentences.cn: 每一座公寓房子后面和每一所住房旁边都有小小的汽车房.

sentences.en: From childhood he had a delight in dwelling on dark things.
sentences.cn: 从童年起他就喜欢思索一些不可思议的事.

sentences.en: He has felt an influence dwelling always upon him like a curse.
sentences.cn: 他已经感觉到有个像是诅咒的势力始终在他身边徘徊.

sentences.en: He occupies a three - story dwelling place on the Park Street.
sentences.cn: 他在派克街上有一幢3层楼的寓所.

sentences.en: In former times there were far fewer people dwelling on earth than there are now.
sentences.cn: 从前生活在地球上的人比今天少得多.

sentences.en: It'shows the types of walls which are often used in dwelling blocks.
sentences.cn: 这表示居住大厦中通常所用的墙的类型.

sentences.en: More than once she discovered his eyes dwelling on her.
sentences.cn: 她不止一次地发现他的眼睛在打量她.

sentences.en: Next time you have a problem, think about how you can improve the situation instead of dwelling on all the negative aspects.
sentences.cn: 下次再碰到问题，想想怎样改善局势，而不是一味考虑那些消极的方面。

sentences.en: Our stable abuts against his dwelling.
sentences.cn: 我们的马厩紧挨着他的住所.

sentences.en: Some 3,500 new dwellings are planned for the area.
sentences.cn: 大约三千五百套新住宅计划在这个地区新建。

sentences.en: The smoke betrays where the dwelling lies.
The two men are dwelling with us.
sentences.cn: 那两个人跟我们住在一起。

sentences.en: Those two men are dwelling with us.
sentences.cn: 那两个人跟我们住在一起.

sentences.en: Without further adventure , they reached the dwelling of Governor Bellingham.
sentences.cn: 之后, 她们便一路平安地来到了贝灵汉总督的住所.

phrases.tran_cn: 居住单元，住宅单元；居住单位

trans.tran_en: a house, apartment etc where people live
